description: Extracts morphological feature information from raw IFCB data. Is compatible with outputs of the V4 WHOI classifier.
name: IFCB feature extractor (WHOI v4 compatible)

ui.help_text: This wizard is used to create V4 features based on the WHOI classifier. Select your raw IFCB data, and a suitable output folder. By default, this program will not overwrite existing files, unless present feature files do not have the expected number of rows.
